title: It's been 2 years are we ever getting ranked 3v3s
body:
I've heard the reasoning (queue time will increase, etc.) but I couldn't care less. In exchange for faster queue times and slightly closer match making I would like ranked 3v3s. I think this view would be shared by a large number of OCE players who simply have given up on complaining about it or even playing on a regular basis.

Anyone reading this and wants normal 3v3s and ranked 3v3s throw an upvote, comment or share this with a friends who would lets see a good change to OCE and quit settling for less.

replies.body:
u can play ranked 3v3.
i played several weeks ago on TT on the time rotation that twisted treeline is on
